question: Which tool exists for microsatellite (SSR) loci detection and primer design?
ideal_answer: Microsatellites are genomic sequences comprised of tandem repeats of short nucleotide motifs widely used as molecular markers in population genetics. FullSSR is a new bioinformatic tool for microsatellite (SSR) loci detection and primer design using genomic data from NGS assay.

snippets.text: FullSSR: Microsatellite Finder and Primer Designer.

Microsatellites are genomic sequences comprised of tandem repeats of short nucleotide motifs widely used as molecular markers in population genetics. FullSSR is a new bioinformatic tool for microsatellite (SSR) loci detection and primer design using genomic data from NGS assay.

FullSSR simplifies the detection of SSRs and primer design on a big data set.
